Packages 
Package Description
com.giift.sdk  
com.giift.sdk.data
This package contains all the data model that shall be used to maintain and manipulate data locally, it contains some SQLiteOpenHelper and a ContentProvider (GiiftProvider)
com.giift.sdk.io
This package contains a few utility functions that shall be used by the different io classes.
com.giift.sdk.io.card  
com.giift.sdk.io.cart  
com.giift.sdk.io.exchange  
com.giift.sdk.io.retailer
This package contains all the interfaces with the server for the retailer (/pos) api.
com.giift.sdk.io.user  
com.giift.sdk.io.wallet
This package contains all the interfaces with the server for the user (wallet) api.
com.giift.sdk.net  
com.giift.sdk.ui  
com.giift.sdk.ui.adapter
This package contains a list of adapters that can be used to feed the different list views
com.giift.sdk.ui.barcode  
com.giift.sdk.ui.barcode.camera  
com.giift.sdk.ui.fragment
This package contains a list of fragments that shall be reused extensively in different versions of full form apps
com.giift.sdk.ui.fragment.pos  
com.giift.sdk.ui.recyclerview  
com.giift.sdk.util
List of utility functions
